Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.cell

Class CellMovement

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.cell.CellMovement
public class CellMovement extends Object
This class allow cells to move in every 4 directions(up,down,left,right) and check if the cells can move or not.
Author:
DongKwanPark-modified

  • Method Details

    • countChanges

      public boolean countChanges()
      This method counts the movement of cells and if there was no movement (count == 0) It will be used to check if the system has to generate random number or not.
      Returns:
      false if there was any modification in cells. But if there was any modification( count > 0) , then it will return true

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      Move all the cells to Left

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight()
      Move all the cells to Right

    • moveUp

      public void moveUp()
      Move all the cells to Up

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown()
      Move all the cells to Down

    • canNotMove

      public boolean canNotMove()
      This method is to check if the game is over ( nothing to move anymore)
      Returns:
      true if cannot move. And returns false if the cells can move.

    • resetCellModi

      public void resetCellModi(Cell[][] cells)
      this method set all cells false for modification
      Parameters:
      cells -
